Page n of nn

This is the story you tell yourself about others.  You place figurative devil horns on the heads of "them".  Someone else is to blame!  This story can place you in a downward spiral of ill feeling and bad temper toward others.

This one puts a figurative halo over your head.  You justify to yourself why you behaved poorly.  And you are never to blame!  You look like the innocent or injured party.  

The Emotional Balcony

Stories we tell ourselves about conflict.

Story #2:  Everyone else in the universe is out to get me.

Story #1:  The universe is out to get me.

Directions:  Click on the devil and the angel sitting on this guy's shoulders to see what we mean.
